comment: If you NEED this class take him, his grading is very simple it's basically just a completion grade. But if you are genuinely interested in this topic I might go with a different professor, Mr. Crocker tends to talk in circles or isn't very clear sometimes.

Easiest class of my life definitely 5 / 5. Only reason he is not posted like that is because he is too easy and people do not like that, they don't properly learn. So, if you want an easy 100, I recommend this class but if you want to learn about this class do not take him. I also did not show up one single day to class. TAKE HIM IF YOU NEED A 100
Easy A. Attendance is not mandatory, I only went once and that was the first day of classes. There are no exams or final. Take him if you just need the credit.
Loved his class, he was very sweet and made the class super easy to pass. By far the easiest class and the nicest most laid back teacher.

This is such an easy course. If you are one of those people that are actually looking for an in depth teaching of environmental science, then look for someone else. But if you want an easy class to take stress off you, then take this. All the people complaining about it being TOO easy are just looking for something to right about. TAKE HIM.

Professor Crocker is cool! If you are not a Science major and wondering why you even have to take a science class, take this professor! Just make sure to stay on top of your assignments because he doesn't take late credit so it becomes very easy to put them off.

You can see what kind of class this is from all the comments. It's super easy, attendance optional, do assignments when you like. So the difficulty rating of 1.0 is sensible. But I disagree with the professor rating of 5.0 most give. He teaches nothing. You'll learn nothing except what you read in the book. That doesn't make him good, just easy.

Amazing professor. He was very chill with the amount of work he gave, if you mess something up he gives you additional chances (even on tests!). Material isn't hard, I don't see how you could do wrong picking this class.

I took Professor Crocker for Environmental Science 1101. Straight off the bat, he is such a sweet and caring man. He makes the class enjoyable and the work is not hard at all. Attendance is not mandatory, but you should still come to stay up to date. 10/10 would recommend.

Dr. Crocker is an amazing and caring person! If you can take him for SCI 1101 and SCI 1102, I can't recommend him enough. I was overwhelmed with taking 6 classes so he opened up all of his assignments at the beginning of the semester for the whole class and allowed us to complete them at our own pace. He would also give great advice!

BEST PROF EVER. NOT ONLY ATTENDING IS OPTIONAL BUT HIS ASSESSMENT ARE SUPER EASY THAT HE IS VERY FORGIVING THAT HE ACCEPTS LATE WORK AND WANT HIS STUDENTS WITH A+. TAKE HIM IF YOU WANT TO LAY OFF A BIT

All assignments are on McGraw-Hill. And all of the assignments are due at the end of the semester so make sure you plan accordingly for the assignments. He does not answer emails so you can only talk to him in class, but this was the easiest A ever.
Very lenient on deadlines. Funny teacher that has a very calm personality. Easy to score very high in this class.

Super easy class. Super nice professor. Assignment's are all online so it doesn't matter if you only attended class once. Extends deadlines to whenever you want. Not stressful at all, would definitely take again and recommend to others.

I took 1101 and loved his class. Lectures can be slow at times but almost all the assignments are online and have multiple attempts with no set due dates. Class isn't mandatory and you could pass not showing up once but I suggest going anyway because he is a sweet guy and loves to see people in class. Will be taking 1102 with him next semester!

He's the best, please take him! There are a lot of assignments, but all of them are online and very easy. He is very funny, and his lectures are interesting. Barely anyone shows up to class because everything is online.

GOAT of gen-eds, took him both science, society, and environment. straightforward assignments almost all through pearson, lectures are entertaining, and he is super caring and charismatic. Would take him again if he offered more classes through my program. 10/10
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Inspirational--Graded by few things

comment: This class is super chill with an easygoing professor. Assignments, quizzes and exams are straightforward, and you can use unstuck AI and other study tools to breeze through. Definitely an easy A if you put in minimal effort.
If you are not a science major and want an easy A+...TAKE HIM. So easy all test and quizzes are online, he will open things past due dates, and attendance isnt mandatory!
Chill Dude

Dr. Crocker is amazing. I am 44 years old going thru a lot in life. Dr. Croker sets out the roadmap ahead from the beginning. It is up to you how you make use of your time. If u slack, please don't take his class. Assignments, Quizzes, Labs, Reflections and 4 online Exams will get you thru the course if you apply yourself. Thanks Dr. Crocker.

Professor Crocker is amazing in every way. His class is set up as a lot of modules to complete on Pearson, so it's basically just a lot of busy work. But in class he talks about interesting stuff and likes to interact with students. He is very funny, wise, and genuinely cares for his students. I'm sad there's not another class I can take from him!

I started out this semester going to class every day but then found out that he didn't really care about attendance and he said we could use open notes for everything including tests. I stopped going and just used quizlet to complete everything and I got a 98. Of course, I didn't learn anything at all or try but it worked for me.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things--Online Savvy

comment: Such an easy class. There was a lot of Pearson assignments but they were all due at the end of the year so everything is at your own pace. Literally such a breeze. I quite literally have no idea what this man looks like, I took him for 2 semesters and never stepped foot in class. Pretty much an online class. TAKE HIM
I highly recommend him. Everything was online, and I only went to 1 class the first week of the semester. Everything is at your own pace, and everything is open note. This class was stress free.
Easy professor, easy class, just lots of homework, except the firm deadline for everything isn't until the end of the semester so no sweat. Do take him,

You only need to show up of class for the first few weeks because of discussion posts, but then there is no need. The tests and quizzes are really easy and it is al open note. No group projects or anything like that, some projects but they are very small and can be done in 20 minutes.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class--Online Savvy

comment: Crocker is so sweet and passionate, doesn't want you to stress & makes class so easy. Attendance doesn't matter, and late work is accepted for full credit. Easy hw & tests. TAKE HIM.

TAKE THIS CLASS!!! I have never been good at science but this was the easiest course I have ever taken. Professor Crocker is super nice and is willing to help you get the grade you want. Tests and quizzes are open note and he encourages you to work with others in your class to do the best you can on them. It is impossible to fail this class take it

This class was super easy, as someone who doesn't like science. He is extremely chill and grades super easy. He is really understanding and accepts late work. Assignments and quizzes are pretty much straight from the textbook. I hardly ever went to class and still passed with an A. Take him if you want a non-stressful class and an easy A!!!

Literally the easiest 100 ever. Attendance is not mandatory and he is very chill. You have until the last week of class to turn in everything with no penalty. He encourages "working with others" aka he does not care if you share answers. Almost all assignments can be found online. I got a 100 without taking any notes or reading anything. SO EASY

Dude's an icon, we know this. This is my 2nd semester taking him and his motto is "Don't stress". The class is so simple (everything is on Quizlet to 'study' questions). This class is so easy that I'd simply add another class to my semester because this is lightwork. He also makes silly jokes so he's a man of the people.
All assignments are online and the deadlines are clear.  Its easy but it is not a real course, i have learned nothing over the semester even after attending when it is optional.

Dr. Crocker is a super friendly and amazing professor. Everything was online and all open notes. His deadlines gave you months to complete everything (just don't do them all last minute). I took both of his 1101 and 1102, showed up a few days throughout both years and still passed with an A. I 100% recommend taking his class!!
Prof. Crocker is super chill. I didn't attend much of his classes and still passed with an A. He lays out everything in d2l. This course was super easy to pass thanks to him!

I honestly never showed up much after the first month. His PowerPoints will tell you everything you need to know. I still passed with an 89 after only showing up for a small amount of classes. Just do you're hw and you'll pass.
Easy A! Everything is on Pearson and open note but it is a decent amount of assignments. Attendance does not matter.

Dr. Crocker is overall just a nice guy and a good professor. All homework assignments, quizzes, and exams are open note. He even let us take the exams with others in class! Easy EASY A. There is a decent amount of homework but you can blow through it pretty quickly and are given months to complete it.
TAKE HIM!! attendances is NOT a thing and you have like all year to do your work so easy

The class is basically a gimmie. The entire semester i basically forgot i was even taking the class. really easy grader, and all of the work is online so its super easy. You would only be hurting yourself if you didn't take crocker.

Honestly this man is amazing. Possibly the best professor I have ever taken. His class is so funny and his assignments are easy. The exams and quizzes are easy as well. Trust me you need to take science with him.
Possibly the best professor out there. Cares about his students and will make sure you succeed.
He is a very nice man who loves his bread and his class is so easy to take. no need to go to class, everything is online and due all at once.

Really easy class. I only went to his class for the first 2-3 weeks, and I found him pretty funny, but he did not teach much during class. All the assignments were online and most answers you could find online. The grade also goes by progression & I ended up finishing the class a month early.
I stopped going the second day of class. To me his lectures were incredibly boring but you don't need to go to do assignments--everything is online. He is nice though, and super easy A. Take him.
this is the best professor ever, easiest class ever take him i love him
Honestly, may God bless this man!!! Take. Him.

Honestly, one of the best professors at KSU. He's so kind & a part-time professor who wants you to succeed. Especially since his science course is 4 credits! Took his in-person course but everything is online, multiple attempts, & isn't due until the end of the semester!! I wish I had taken him for my other science credit!! TAKE HIM!!!!!!!

Love this professor & very easy class! Attendance not mandatory. Everything except for a few assignments can be done outside of class. He puts in grades quickly, responds to emails quickly, and is understanding.

I never went to this class because everything was accessible online. If you have time to go, you should because he enjoys having people in class (he's extremely chill). We had lots of assignments, quizzes, and tests and he wasn't strict about the deadline, but I recommend doing it sooner rather than later because it will pile up. Easy class overall

He was a really nice guy, attendance was not mandatory, but it helped if you went. We'd usually have online homework that was really easy as well. It was a very easy A as long as you completed your assignments (some of them were literally drawings), but I didn't retain much information either. It's a great class for an A but you won't learn much.
Really cool guy. Easy A if you do the homework assignments. I recommend Professor Crocker for an easy 1101 and 1102 class.

Was an extremely easy class for being a business major who's required to take a science class. went to class only a few time the entire semester and was able to easily figure out everything. assignments normally didnt have a due date till the end of semester... did hear he might change attendance next semester but idk

TAKE THIS PROFESSOR. If you are like me and just need this course to fill a requirement, Crocker is the prof for you. This man understands that we are human beings just trying our best and he makes your life in his class so easy. I would genuinely die for this man.

Highly suggest, havent shown up since the second week and do a month worth of work in a few hours with no late penalty, only downside is the initial $100 to access everything and decently dependent on the groupme for quiz answers. show up if you want the quiz answers in person, hes a respectable professor knowing this is a gen-ed course.

I stopped going to class the first day because everything is online and doesn't have a due date until the end of the semester. Be sure to keep up with your work though because it will pile up the more you wait to complete it. Great guy!
Amazing professor. Everything is due at the end of the semester and the work is so easy. Perfect class for satisfying your core.
I would defiantly take this professor again. I took him for 1101 and loved his class. I stopped going to his class because everything is online. I would 100% take his class.

He was a really good professor and made the class, assignments, and tests super easy. I stopped going after a few weeks, but everything was online too. If you do go to his class, he will give the answers to quizzes. Super easy, non-stressful class though, I'm taking SCI 1102 in the fall with him.

Mr. Crocker is literally the nicest person you will ever meet. He's a teacher that actually cares about his students and makes the class easy enough to the point where you would have to literally do nothing in order to fail. Almost everything can be done online and each assignment (quizzes and tests) has 3 attempts. Sweetest guy ever, take him.

Assignments and tests on Pearson. They are easy and multiple attempts. Hw is the same questions as tests so take pictures to take tests with. Lab answers are given in class. Very few other D2L assignments that are pretty easy. Overall caring nice guy.
All of class was able to be done without going to class. Easy assignments, easy quizzes, and easy tests without lockdwon. 110% recommend taking crocker

1) first day he made sure that mental health is very important 2) We have little to no homework and the quizzes are super easy. The test is EXACTLY like the quiz but shorter. 3 attempts on quizzes, 2 attempts on tests. 100 on every one. He takes the lab quizzes with us which is helpful. I know Im going to pass with an A+ TAKE HIM!!!!

Im only 4 weeks in but I can already tell you that this will be the easiest A ive ever gotten. Professor Crocker is awesome and all of the work can be done online. That being said, I only really go to class when we have labs but its honestly an enjoyable class so I recommend actually showing up even though attendance isnt necessary at all.

Professor Crocker is a good man, but he is not so good as a professor. You DO get the feeling that he genuinely cares for his students' success, but he cares SO MUCH that his own lectures become completely unnecessary. If you desire an INCREDIBLY easy core requirement, go for it, but you will gain NOTHING from it in the long run.

Crocker is a pretty cool teacher but his class on the other hand is not as much. His class is very easy in the sense that you can do everything online. His homework and quizzes are almost the exact same as his tests. His labs on the other hand are so difficult because his lectures dont cover it. Take this class with caution.

TAKE THIS PROFESSOR, coolest dude ever!!!! This class is such a GPA booster and Professor Crocker is amazing. Prof Crocker actually cares about his students and their mental health and makes class something to look forward to. He lets you work together on all assignments ,, honestly it would be harder to fail this class than it would be to pass.

Absolutely easiest class I've ever taken. All the homework and quizzes have multiple attempts and the tests are exactly the same as the quizzes, just way shorter. Only part actually difficult were the lab quizzes, but they're not that bad. Didn't even have a final.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Test heavy--Clear grading criteria

comment: I honestly did not go to his class again after the second week. He was saying things that we really could see online. Everything is on Mastering & D2L. Quizzes and HWs were not hard really. Just sit down and take the time out to complete it. He does take late work but I did assignments on time so I wouldnt fall behind. I got a 90% very easy A!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: Very easy class, I showed up on the first day and never again. You don't need the full textbook, just the code to access the homework is good enough. Lab quizzes take 1-2 hours to complete, so be prepared for that. Overall very easy and he seemed nice! (I second the Benjamin Franklin comment) :).

If you like to get A's in college than I recommend taking him. He extends the due dates and class is not mandatory as long as you keep up with your stuff and turn everything in then it should be an easy A

THE REAL MVP!!! He understands some students have to work and prioritize other classes. He extends due dates and allows you to retake assignments. Thank you Dr. Crocker for making my semester less stressful.
Take Professor Crocker if you can! Easiest A ever.
He is such an easy grader, and cares about his students. If you need help, just email him and he's there for you. He'll push due dates back if you need them to be. He's an easy A.

I have had professor Crocker twice now and both times I was very pleased by his class. He tells you at the beginning of the semester what is expected and it is then up to you to do the rest. He is very very understanding. If you put in a small bit of effort you will get an A.

You really dont have to go to his class, just read the textbooks, do the mastering assignments, and all other related assignments. The class required a lot of assignments, but the quizzes and tests were on mastering and were basically the same. He is a good professor, his lectures are just boring.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework--Respected

comment: Take this course because you won't regret your decision! This is gonna be one of the easiest A you can get it..

TAKE HIM IF YOU WANT AN EASY A! He is super easy going but I didn't learn a single thing to be honest. Easy GPA booster. Lots of mastering homework, a couple of easy assignments not related to the class, and a lot of tests but it's openbook. Don't take him if you're trying to go to med school, you won't learn a thing but other than that he is great
This professor is a real Gem!!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: The best professor and looks just like Benjamin Franklin. He is absolutely amazing, cares for every single student, and just wants them to pass. He is heavy on teaching topics of real life to help you succeed, not necessarily related to biology. Class is optional and everything is due at the end of the semester. Very lenient, offers extra credit.
Super and chill Professor!! This is the easiest A that I received for a science class.

Professor Crocker is amazing he really does set his students up to succeed in class. I ended the course with a 100% average defiantly would have loved to have taken him for SCI 1101 however he was great for SCI 1102. 100% recommend taking him for environmental science!
Easiest class ever, he is supper chill, tests are easy.
He lets you turn in late work until a few weeks before finals, and understands that other classes can get hectic. I took him for 1101

I wish every Professor was like Dr. Crocker. He lets you turn in late work until a few weeks before finals, and understands that other classes can get hectic. I took him for 1101 and he kept the same energy in 1102. He is a really smart guy and I'm glad I got to take his class because not a lot of professors are as genuine as him. Take him!!
This is one of easiest classes that I have ever taken!! I recommend taking this class.
This class was a GPA booster!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Hilarious

comment: Professor Crocker is amazing! Such a sweet and funny man, definitely cares about students.
Easy class!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: If you do the work it is an easy A.
This is a very easy A for a science course, but I do recommend taking him!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: Professor Crocker is amazing! Such a sweet and funny man, definitely cares about students. The class is so easy, consists of monthly units, weekly quizzes (everything is on quizlet and without lockdown browser because as he would say "it's creepy"). Take him!
Take if you want an easy A! Homework, quizzes and exams on mastering.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: Professor Crocker is the best teacher I have ever had at Kennesaw State University. Do your work and you will get an A. I highly recommend to take any of Professor Crockers classes.

Easily THE best professor I have ever had. Currently taking 1102 with him and it has been just as amazing as 1101. He doesn't do lockdown or webcam and he genuinely wants you to succeed. I swear you would have to try harder to fail than you would to pass.
He is the best teacher you will EVER have! hes so caring and wants you to succeed! You can use your resources for tests and quizzes. def recommend him!!!!

Dr. Crocker is honestly a great professor. You can tell he is very laid back, but at the same time he really wants you to do well. You can work at your own pace and get ahead. There is a ton of homework and guided quizzes to do, but it is all easy material that is very manageable. I would recommend him with confidence.

EASY class! Not the best choice for BIO majors who need to learn the material, but if you need an easy class you don't have to worry about, his class is a good choice. I took his class online, and there was no lectures just mastering bio work and a few projects, some of which aren't really relative to BIO but are good life lessons.
Good amount of work, but its the easiest A TRUST ME !!
Easy A but a good amount of work.
Take if you want an easy A! Homework, quizzes and exams on mastering. And I few poster presentation projects but other then that. Easy A!
rating_tags: Respected--Lots of homework--Graded by few things

comment: Easiest class. Sometimes quizzes are time consuming but Quizlet will be your friend. Theres a couple labs that must be done for lab quizzes but they aren't hard if you do the lab correctly. Professor Crocker is very chill. If you get the chance to take him, you will not regret it. You can tell that he wants everyone to pass. &no lockdown browser.

Hes okay, the labs dont really go with learning. Lots of kids struggled on the labs. But he does allow you to redo ANYTHING until the very end. Hes a good teacher if you struggle with keeping up with anything and need extra time, but I didnt struggle with that. Hes a decent teacher, and a solid choice if you need a science class
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Lecture heavy

comment: Dr. Crocker's class is incredibly straight forward. There's about 3 assignments a week that build off each other. He offers credit for missed assignments! You do need to buy the online code for the homework, but I never needed the text itself. As long as you try at all, you'll pass.
Homework and exams are on MasteringBiology which is easy, 2 posters, and 4 discussion papers. You have to read the textbook though in order to understand and do the homework. Don't forget to plan!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria

comment: Max Crocker has got to be the BEST prof I have ever had. He is extremely flexible and is willing to do anything to help you pass. I cannot stress enough how easy this class was and I am taking him again next semester.

Crocker was absolutely amazing!!! He clearly understood the stress that these online classes can have on students and was very understanding with his students and wanted everyone to succeed. I would highly recommend taking him if your just tryna to get a core out of the way. He will make it bearable!!! Lots of tests and he but it's easy to study!!!
It is the easiest class! Trust me.
Classes is very easy. If you do the work it is an easy A.
Recommended
Easiest and the best professor at KSU
rating_tags: Respected--Lots of homework--Get ready to read

comment: Majority of your homework, test, and Quizzes are on Pearson! This course is a Easy A !
The best professor at KSU and an easy A for ecology lab. The class was online and consisted of a few worksheets and a final report. Take him for an easy A.

I appreciate this man so much. He cares about his students and their success. I wish there were more teachers like him at Kennesaw because he is the only one that understands there is no need to overcomplicate everything. Best choice for biology, and if he teaches any other classes, TAKE HIM. Lots of homework on Mastering, but tons of extra credit.

Easy A. If you are a biology or other science major you might want to take another teacher because you wont learn a thing. A big chunk of your grade will come from the assignments on Mastering Biology. Other grades come from assignments/projects. Attendence isnt mandatory but he does announce random assignments/projects in class so you should go.
rating_tags: Group projects--Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework

comment: This class is a really easy A. I maybe showed up to one class and ended up with a 100%. If you made anything lower than that, you just didnt try. There is plenty of extra credit and easy homework and tests.

A TA taught the lab, however the work isnt overwhelming at all. There are two full lab reports that you have plenty of time to do and as long as you follow directions on each lab you will do good. The grading isnt harsh at all and the class is pretty fun.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria

comment: There is a lot of mastering, and he has a lot of projects over the course of the semester. You dont even need to attend class as long as you do the homework and projects you will get an A. This class is super easy and hes a really nice guy

Easy A and great class to take if you have a busy semester. All assignments are done online even exams. All answers are online. For the projects I just copied and paste anything online I do not even think he reads them. Do not get mad if you do not learn anything. Ended with a 100%

Great professor, mastering bio is worth half of your grade, all tests are on mastering, final exam optional but good to see your improvement, about 3 posters we had to do for class, class isnt mandatory. 100% would take him again

Best professor ever. Take him. Literally is so kind during office hours and much more understanding than any professor at KSU. HE IS THE BEST!!! Easy class, with a very good professor that is kindhearted and teaches you about life goals and focuses on your future. Don't miss out!! :)

An amazing teacher and super funny guy. If you are taking is class, I DONT RECOMMEND. You really don't learn anything but life skills. Lots of homework but can be knocked out in a full day for the whole semester. Hw is 50% of grade. If you want an easy class you don't have to go to, then take him!

Dr. Crocker is an amazing teacher and person. He will help you mentally , emotionally, through tutoring, throwing wisdom- anything. He is incredible and would recommend to any student good or bad at biology he will do what it takes to help you succeed. Very respectable person.

Take him if you want an easy A. Do not take him if you want to learn biology. We learned nothing for his summer class, so it's great if you just need an A but if you need biology later in life do NOT take him. All work is done on mastering. The rest are random projects over anything but biology.

Dr. Crocker is the sweetest professor at Kennesaw State. He really cares about his students and his class is an easy A, however if you are a bio major DONT TAKE HIS CLASS. You will learn nothing about biology. And he also ended homework early so we can focus on other classes but the ironic thing is we have 3 projects due during finals..

I cannot do anything but say great things about Dr. Crocker. He is dedicated and invested in helping his students succeed by integrating professionalism into the class. He expects his students to do the work at home, but tests, homework, and quizzes are online. This class is an easy A. You will get out of the class as much as what you put into it!

All he wants is for his students to pass. Quizzes and homework are online. He goes over what's going to be on the test the class before, so although attendance isn't mandatory, I would definitely show up for those. He tries to make class interesting and fun. Overall this class is an easy A.
Easy A. I only showed up for test days and still made an A. If you want an easy science class this is definitely the one for you!

I barely tried and ended up with an A in the class. He's extremely care-free, funny, and approachable. You can afford to skip some classes, but make sure you're there before the tests because he drops hints on what to study/what to ignore. I think he prides himself on making the class easy and giving his students a break. Take him if you can!
This class is a easy A if you are not going to take upper level bio classes. 4 tests each 10% with 3 group projects and 1 individual ppt. Homework is 60% so thats a plus.

He is very funny with his lectures and makes them interesting. He does not take attendance, but if you don't go to class you will might miss something that is being graded. quizzes are super easy and tests are very similar to the quizzes.

If you are not into science this is the class for you. He is super funny, caring, and honestly doesn't care. Quizzes are on DTL, just look up the Quizlet. Test are pretty simply. Attendance isn't mandatory, he posts the lecture slides online, but does give hints of questions on the tests.

Do not buy the text book. Mastering is essential for the class so make sure you keep up to date for them. The class is overall very easy, you can afford to miss a lot. If you go to class, you are entertained as Mr Crocker makes jokes and tries to relates to the class. Definitely recommended!!!
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Hilarious

comment: Dont't buy a textbook! This class is easy if you show and easy if you dont. You can just sit in the back of the room and cheat on his test and if you sit in the front you can just ask the peope around you without getting caught. Attendance isn't mandatory . Homework is all on quizlet and he drops you 2 lowest quiz grades

Enjoyed Croker's lab. He always gives feedback on all lab reports and he is pretty fast at responding to emails. He is a bit hard when grading lab reports but will give plenty extra credit points at the end of semester. Finished the class with a 100. Highly recommend if you want an easy A!!

I really did enjoy Crocker's lab. He is one of the nicest and most caring professors and he always talks to his students about non school related things. He is a bit harsh on lab reports but he gave a decent amount of extra credit. I finished with a 100 in the class. Highly recommend him and he is always happy to answer any questions.
Easy A. No need to go to class. Online homework throughout the semester that is not challenging and 4 in class exams.

Homework is not hard but is a giant chunk of your grade. Tests are okay, difficult but not hard. Does do quizzes/assessment, can take as a group in class. Split up the class into groups and you work with them at least once a week.

Hes a nice guy, so personable! The homework is easy to find on Quizlet, the quizzes are also easy. They come from the homework, which can be reopened, and he applauds people for using that resource. It is hard to prepare for his tests though, because his lectures don't prepare you for them at all, so the best thing to do is go back to study the hw.

Dr. Crocker is definitely an interesting professor. You literally have no idea what to expect from lectures each day. Tests are pretty much common knowledge, and the tests are difficult to study for as you aren't really sure what to expect. Do the homework and you'll have no trouble getting an A in this class
homework on line just need the acess code not physical book. talks about everything but class, just go and you'll pass, test questions come from quizzes and slides shown in class, easy A
Gives 5 tests, were straight from book and homework. I missed 10+ classes but still passed all of the tests. The final was easy also. Would definitely suggest him!!

He was a good guy and very friendly. His class is an easy A. Most of your grade is on the homework online but its extremely easy and you can find it all on quizlet. The tests are easy if you know the vocab words he discusses and study the quizlets. You dont have to go to class at all. Quizzes are online so I always took them from home. Nice guy.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: He focused mainly on resources for success and how to write a research paper. 60% of grade was mastering homework, 40% 4 tests. Take home tests and would let us rework problems we got wrong for full credit. We didn't learn one thing about BIO1108 but if you're not taking any upper level BIO courses I would definitely recommend him. Such an easy A.

Hardly teaches. Gets off topic every class. Hardly anyone shows up. Haven't learned a thing here. Easy A. Would recommend making a GroupMe for the class. Makes it more interesting. Also, he puts stuff from his twitter on exams?
Weekly quizzes. Super awesome guy. Class wasn't taken seriously by anyone until the very end. Would definitely recommend.
rating_tags: Respected--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: Mr. Crocker was a very interesting teaacher. His classes are kinda weird and so are his tests. The tests don't really have anything that you can study for and you don't really know what will be on the tests, but they always end up being easy. Overall, probably the best teacher for this class if you're trying to do good though.
rating_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Would take again

comment: Easy online homework, weekly 1 question quizzes for attendance (he gives you the answer), tests are mostly based off lectures and a little bit of the homework. Very easy class! Definitely take him if you can

DR. Crocker is such an easy professor! He cares about students grades, and thus his quizzes and tests are too easy. There are no labs in this class, and homework only on MES. Quizzes are 1 question and easy. TAKE HIM!!! Highly recommend.

Dr. Crocker is seriously the best! Class is so easy because almost everything is online & all the answers are on quizlet. truly cares about his students, their grades and is so passionate about the subject. Tests are easy if you pay even the slightest bit of attention in class. random 1 question pop quizzes for attendance but he gives the answer

Summer semester. So 3hr class so It was very lecture heavy. He makes it clear from the start that he cares and he expects A's/B's. It wasn't hard only one test was hard which he said "Test 3 will be the hardest."  Not many HW assignments. Test mainly based off what he says in class.  Barely used textbook.

Professor Crocker is one of the best professors at KSU. He is a man who cares about his students and will help you if you ask for it. He gives 1 makeup test later in the semester and gives 1 quiz each classday. Don't forget to check MylabMastering for assignments.

Not a harsh grader on most assignments. Lectures are sometimes clear, others are not. Funny guy. Got nearly all A's on every assignment except on one which he gave a zero for even though I had some information on it. Wouldn't let me turn it in late (as said) on turnitin. Grade is now a D because of that one assignment. Should have had more time.

This guy is so easy but you HAVE to go to class in order to pass this class. He gives weekly pop quizzes that he gives you the answers for, you just have to be there in order to get credit. For exams, just read the articles he shares on twitter and read over and links that he posts on the timeline for that exam and you'll get at least a B.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: I got a C in SCI 1101, and I was really concerned about taking 1102. However this class was a breeze! Every week a "pop quiz" is given, (1 question) and most of the time Crocker gives you the answer and if not makes it pretty obvious which question is the right choice. His test are mostly graphs that we go over in class. Got an A in the class.

Max Crocker is the coolest dude. Show up for class and you'll get an A. He gives random pop quizzes that have 1 question each. I never had to study for his tests either. They are all based off of graphs and charts and honestly common sense. I definitely recommend. He's a funny guy to listen too.

Lectures are long. They may seem useless and you might not feel like you learned anything, but if you want an A, I would advise going to class. If you are okay with a B, then you can easily get one. The grading criteria isn't that clear so make sure you read and understand the grading system on the syllabus.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Max Crocker is a cool dude and his class is pretty easy. The test are all about interpreting graphs and charts so studying is not needed. Try to go to every class, because he has easy 1 question pop quizzes and that can really boost your grade (worth 160 points out of 560). Each test is worth 100 points and there are 4 tests.

In SCI 1102 he knows that the people who are taking the class most likely dont care about the class, and are just getting science credits in. He gives super easy tests and gives 1-2 question pop-quizzes that he basically tells you the answer to, its just so people come to class. He's super nice and as long as you are there for the quizzes, its easy

This will be the easiest and most enjoyable science class you will take in college. Easy A if you study for your tests and come to class for all quizzes. Gives random pop quizzes (usually on Fridays) and they are 1-2 questions (everyone makes a 100 if you pay attention). Attendance isn't mandatory, but you will get a "0" if you miss a quiz
rating_tags: Respected--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Crocker is one of the most laid back and nicest professors there is. He makes sure that everyone that comes to class passes. He puts his classes into periods so the class isn't frustrating and doesn't seem as long. He doesn't make the material hard either. If you're not great at science, I definitely suggest this professor!!!

Professor Crocker is such a sweetheart and enjoyable to be around. His lectures are ok, well boring actually, but he understands this is an entry-level class/non-science major class and doesn't make this class hard or challenging. He was very flexible on grading and curved our tests as well. Take him, show up, and you'll do fine!

Chose him because of the 'attendance unnecessary' reviews. If I had gone to class, I would have learned how he actually grades students and crucial things that aren't on the syllabus that are essential to passing. GO TO CLASS. Do the labs and 4 exams, must read book. BUY the CODE, book unnecessary. Whole class was very easy IF you show up.
Class was enjoyable.  He's a cool guy.  Tests were okay.  He's very helpful and approachable.

I honestly went to this class maybe 3 times not including test days and got a B. If you've taken an environmental science class in high school, it's basically the same material. The times that I did go to class Prof. Crocker seemed really nice and funny and he genuinely wants you to pass. I read the book chapters before the tests.

Took him for 1101 & 1102. Easy class, but boring. I only took notes on the websites he went over in class, which he does ask about on the tests. He posts the PowerPoints online. I rarely used the book. Half this class is about reading graphs. Study about 2-3 hours for each test and you'll be fine. If you skip too many classes, you'll be confused.

This class is so confusing. All we do is view different websites in  class. The tests have nothing on what we discussed in class, except the handful of questions he gives you on "review day". I expressed my concerns to the professor several times and was told not to worry, he expected A's and B's an that's what he usually gets. AVOID!

This has been one of the hardest science classes I have ever taken. Idk if the people leaving the reviews on here are science majors or have a good background knowledge of science or what. In class, all he does is show different websites and talk about them. He occasional goes over powerpoints. The tests were over none of the websites shown.

I took environmental science with Prof. Crocker. He is soooo boring. The questions on the tests are often unclear but also fairly easy. I made a 100 in this class. I never missed a class or a review day though. He gives lots of bonus points
Attendance is not mandatory. The test are easy and you just have to do the weekly homework. Taking him again next semester for 1102

This is a very easy professor. Class is by no means necessary. Although, I do recommend reading over the chapters if you want 100% confidence. Take the practice quizzes online from the book for extra confidence. Do the online hw every week!! There's no reason to get less than an A.

This class is one of the easiest classes I have ever taken. You could not study for his tests and still get a solid C. He has 4 tests and that's it. Class is not mandatory. If you miss a test, you have to write everything you know over the tested chapter, so don't miss a test if possible. Textbook not needed, no homework

Awesome class! He made class super easy and he was very sweet. Attendance was not mandatory by any means. Just make sure you know you know your stuff for the test (easy test) and remember to do your homework on time. 10/10 would recommend!

Most annoying professor I have ever had. Shoves liberal views down your throat. Doesn't actually teach anything, is boring, and full of himself. The tests are very easy and common sense. If you don't make an A in this class there is something wrong with you. If you want a class where you don't learn anything but still make an A Crocker is for you.

Attendance doesn't matter at all. Test aren't long & not hard! I did not study at all and passed them all, surprisingly. There are online assignments too that help with overall grade! Some test have extra credit questions in them. Easy class, I would definitely recommend him! & also so funny & sarcastic!

LOVED Professor Crocker. His lectures can be a little long, but they are worth it. He is very knowledgable about this subject and talks about topics relevant in today's society. I took him for SCI1101 as well. If you have the opportunity to take this professor, do it! Great professor, easy A, and you will learn a lot. Textbook isn't needed!

super easy. Didn't go to class or study. He is super boring, but dry humor and nice. Would take him again cause his tests are kind of common sense.  Just put a little bit of effort/show up to take tests and not be a complete idiot and you will pass without a problem. dont need a textbook

His lectures are very boring but he is very nice and know what he is talking about. If you have to take this class take him! his tests are very easy and you do not need to show up for class. You dont really need the textbook too

LOVE Professor Crocker. He's such a great professor, and I'm so glad I get to take him for Science 1102. There are four tests and does not give a final. He is willing to work with you if needed. He also gives extra credit. Very easy class if you study and do the weekly MES assignments. Take him if you ever get the opportunity.

Class is optional but HIGHLY recommended if you want an easier A. TONS of chances for extra credit! Monotonous sometimes but you can tell he's a very nice person and loves what he teaches. I would take him again! Cares about his students and their grades.

Great Professor, cares about his students! If you don't make an A in this class it's your fault.  Book provided test was confusing, so he substituted test, with questions submitted by students. Lots of extra credit.  Attendance not mandatory but u benefit from attending! Treats students with respect and wants to change your view of environment.

In all honesty if you really want to get a good grade and learn about the environment this class is for you. He has a tendency to be monotonous in his speech, but the class was really easy and somewhat informative. There were only 4 tests but they were straight-forward and came straight from the lectures, if you want to get extra-cred goto class.

Hw assignments every week. If the labs are on the test its hard, if they aren't on the tests it's easy. Labs aren't mandatory!! You don't have to go to class because he doesn't say anything important ever!!
This is by far the easiest class I have taken this semester. All you have to do is the required MES assignments and you'll have the knowledge to do well on test day

This class can be an easy a as long as you read over the chapters and do the weekly MES assignments. Read over the labs as well in order to get the lab questions on the test. You really don't need to go to class as long as you read the chaptersstudy at home. He's a cool guy, big lecture class.
